title: NVIDIA Riva gRPC API Missing Authentication for Critical Function Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of NVIDIA Riva. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the riva_quickstart component. The issue results from the lack of authentication prior to allowing access to functionality. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to bypass authentication on the system.
addtionnal_details: NVIDIA has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/5625
timeline:
2024-11-05 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-03-13 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-03-13 - Advisory Updated
credit: David Fiser and Alfredo Oliveira ( Nebula of Trend Micro )
